Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: genai is able to explain the same concept multiple ways until you understand. it has also made processing information quicker and easier and is personal to you. teachers don't have the time to address problems or help you to understand things

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: genai gives personal constructive feedback and gives examples of how to improve. teachers rarely give feedback that includes ways to improve
